website_summaries.verdict: Among Puma lifestyle sneakers, the original Puma Muse was designed to fit women’s fast-paced activities. It quickly became a go-to shoe and has led to several iterations. The Puma Muse Chase not only carries the legacy of a modern creation but provides a fresh perspective as well.An update to a modern classic, the model emerged as a fan favorite. Reviewers praised its style, colorful design, and comfort. It also delivered great support and a perfect fit. At $80, it brought excellent value to the table.
pros: The Puma Muse Chase comes at a budget-friendly price
Most users commended the style of the sneaker, calling it super cute
Although the model only has a few colorways, some reviewers thought that the colors looked fun
Quite a few buyers were pleased with the shoe’s value at its cost
According to a lot of purchasers, the Puma Muse Chase on feet is comfortable
It has excellent support, remarked a couple of wearers
Many buyers confirmed that the sneaker offered a perfect fit
In the Puma Muse Chase’s reviews, more than a handful of users imparted that they would recommend the model
Some purchasers reported that they received a lot of compliments for the kicks
cons: According to several reviewers, the Puma Muse Chase when worn must be broken in first
It initially fits tight and only stretches with use

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, love the pop of color on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: Just got them. love them. They are comfortable and stylish. I normally wear 7.5 in women puma sneakers as it the only brand sneakers I wear, this one is a bit big. I could have gone down to 7, but you can't tell. They are look perfect
customer_reviews.author: Janice Wilmot

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it felt better on the second day of wearing it. First day it felt like it was suffocating my feet. Overall it cute and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Direds

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful shoe but it doesn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I have used the shoes a couple times to walk on the treadmill and just around the house doing my regular every-day stuff, my feet felt pinched, the tops, and actually fell asleep because the shoe was too tight on the top. I paid $55 which is fine but I was sad these didn't feel better for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: NotLimaH

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes❤
customer_reviews.text: Fits wonderfully and I love the colors, received lots of compliments
customer_reviews.author: Ebony Marie

customer_reviews.title: Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: I loved the style of these shoes, but they were too tight across the top of my foot. I have narrow feet so it was surprising that the shoe was so tight on me. I gave them to my granddaughter, and she's able to wear them with no problems. Still a good shoe, just the wrong fit for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I like this. Feels like a puma original. I will give it a year to truly judge. All my previous puma sneakers serve me well and long and that's why I got this.
customer_reviews.author: Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sporty
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes super cute got the red ones also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: I never had pumas before and these are just so beautiful and conformable, the colors a brilliant and really makes the sneaker stand out.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Kicks
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are super cushioned, add a little height and look awesome. I got my 6 year old daughter a kid’s pair in a different color and she loves hers too.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tennis
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size up as recommended but it fits kinda big. I am a size 10 order 10.5

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: Tight around the ankle. Which makes it hard to put on.

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my fren bday and shes loving it fit perfect!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Puma word is a florescent orange yuk!
customer_reviews.text: There comfortable , love the pink and black but not crazy about the Name pume in florescent orange.I feel colors dont match

customer_reviews.title: LOVE ❣️
customer_reviews.text: These are practically my all time favorite sneakers. They are super cute, comfortable, and look quite expensive.. they are a bit narrow, BUT they stretch to fit your foot once you wear them a couple of times.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love ! So comfortable, love that there is not mesh on top like most tennis shoes these days , love puma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They were a little difficult to put on at first but once on they are amazing!!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoe
customer_reviews.text: This sneaker was everything I needed! Stylish and very comfortable. I can walk in this all day !

customer_reviews.title: I love the shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: These are just perfect! The color is amazing and I get lots of compliments on them.

customer_reviews.text: I order two pair of shoes and I didn’t like this one much.verry uncomfortable but I kept it.i don’t wear it much.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love it is so comfortable. I am so happy with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Jus to love them.
customer_reviews.text: I just love these. Fit is great, colors are fun, and they are holding up so well.

product_meta.title: Puma Womens Muse Chase Wn`S Shoes, 5.5 UK, Fig/Shocking Orange
product_meta.description: This season the PUMA muse feautures a brand new feminine, running-inspired silhouette. This iteration features a slip-on textile upper for comfort, whilst the elastic strap and PUMA branding on the heel give a clean and sporty look. The chase edition has a satin-like upper, with contrasting colours to create a unique and feminine look.
